class Solution(object):
    def countOfPairs(self, nums):
        mod = 10**9 + 7
        n = len(nums)
        mx = max(nums)
        dp = [[0]*(mx+1) for _ in range(n)]
        for i in range(nums[0]+1):
            dp[0][i] = 1

        for i in range(1, n):
            cur = nums[i]
            prev = nums[i-1]
            k = 0
            for j in range(cur + 1):
                if j > 0:
                    dp[i][j] = dp[i][j-1]
                while k <= min(j, prev) and prev - k >= cur - j:
                    dp[i][j] += dp[i-1][k]
                    k += 1

            dp[i][j] %= mod
        
        # for i in range(1, n):
        #     num = nums[i]
        #     prev = nums[i-1]
        #     for j in range(num + 1):
        #         for k in range(j+1):
        #             if prev - k >= num - j:
        #                 dp[i][j] += dp[i-1][k]
        #     dp[i][j] %= mod
        
        return sum(dp[-1])%mod
